text: Money is usually attracted, not pursued.

text: Your family and your love must be cultivated like a garden. Time, effort, and imagination must be summoned constantly to keep any relationship flourishing and growing.

text: Goals: There is no telling what you can do when you get inspired by them. There is no telling what you can do when you believe in them. There is no telling what will happen when you act upon them.

text: To solve any problem, here are three questions to ask yourself: First, what could I do? Second, what could I read? And third, who could I ask?

text: Your life does not get better by chance, it gets better by change.

text: The major reason for setting a goal is for what it makes of you to accomplish it. What it makes of you will always be the far greater value than what you get.

text: Don't wish it was easier, wish you were better. Don't wish for less problems, wish for more skills. Don't wish for less challenges, wish for more wisdom. text: You've got to believe in the possibilities. You've got to believe that tomorrow can be better than today. And here's the big one. Believe in yourself.

text: If it doesn’t challenge you, it won’t change you. Don’t wish it were easier. Wish you were better.

text: Don’t spend most of your time on the voices that don’t count. Tune out the shallow voices so that you will have more time to tune in the valuable ones.

text: The more you care, the stronger you can be.

text: Profits are better than wages. Wages make you a living; profits make you a fortune.

text: Resolve says, 'I will.' The man says, 'I will climb this mountain. They told me it is too high, too far, too steep, too rocky, and too difficult. But it's my mountain. I will climb it. You will soon see me waving from the top or dead on the side from trying.
author: Jim Rohn

text: Never attack a problem without also presenting a solution.

text: Love yourself enough to live a healthy lifestyle. One healthy meal at a time. Take care of your body. It’s the only place you have to live.

text: Life is not just the passing of time. Life is the collection of experiences and their intensity.

text: Character isn't something you were born with and cant change, like your fingerprints. It's something you weren't born with and must take responsibility for forming.

text: Average people look forward to 'getting off.' Successful people look forward to 'getting on.
